title: Saving The Penn State Roar (Podcast)
itunes:title: Saving The Penn State Roar (Podcast)
description:
Scarlet Fu, Michael Barr and Mike Lynch discuss the biggest stories in the Business of Sports. “Saving The Roar” recounts the story of the 2012 Penn State Football Team. Today were joined by Director & Producer Mike Nash and 2012 Penn State linebacker Michael Mauti to find out why the 2012 team so important to the community. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
